title: FEATURE JOBS: Zambesi, Foxtel, Havas + More
text:
Are you interested in meeting more than 20 scaling companies and finding out which company is the best fit for you? Zambesi have partnered with Australian Computer Society to present an event where you can meet and greet 20 amazing companies! These companies will include Canva, Airtasker, Prospa and Pet Circle! These companies will reveal what it would be like to work with them, their current job vacancies and the skills you would need to possess to be a part of their team. All you need to do is visit here for more information.

Are you a full-stack developer looking for your next opportunity? You are in luck because Havas Media is currently recruiting for a full time Mid Level Full Stack Developer (MELB)! Havas is a growing organisation who’s software allows users to access a range of features, such as document management, asset library, invoicing and timesheets. The successful applicant will need to have 5 years experience in PHP, a minimum 2 years of Laravel and experience developing highly scalable code. If you are a curious, driven, friendly and collaborative person with the skills needed for this job, apply now!

Foxtel is on the hunt for a part-time Lifestyle Co-Host for a new lifestyle TV show coming soon. This role is perfect for a charismatic and passionate Property expert who is eager to be on TV. To apply for this exciting opportunity, all you need to do is upload an introductory 2-3 minute video and explain why you want to help Australians design their dream homes!

Too long and didn’t read? Why not try out the below opportunities instead?

Axis Social, a specialist Facebook and Instagram advertising agency are looking for a full time Digital Agency Sales Consultant/BDM (SYD). Apply here.

Want to work for a great non-for-profit organisation? Oaktree are on the look out for a Victorian Assistant State Director and Head of International Engagement. Click on the links provided to apply!

Didn’t find what you were looking for? Find out more about our ethical jobs & non-for-profit jobs, jobs in WA and our jobs in Sydney, Perth, Melbourne, Brisbane, Adelaide, Gold Coast and more.

Follow us on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn and get yourself signed up to our Daily Job Alerts.

For employers looking to Post a Job, click here.
